GeDBIT.dist

类 WHDGlobalFragmentMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeDBIT.dist.SequenceFragmentMetric
      • GeDBIT.dist.WHDGlobalFragmentMetric
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Metric, java.io.Serializable

    public class WHDGlobalFragmentMetric
extends SequenceFragmentMetric
    This class computes global alignment with weighted Hamming distance
    版本:
    2004.03.02
    作者:
    Weijia Xu, Rui Mao

        public WeightMatrix getWeightMatrix()
